item.title: Counseling and Prevention Resources
item.description: Counseling and Prevention Resources Here is a list of global helplines, because sometimes outside support is needed to help you make positive changes. United States & Canada Crisis Text Line https://www.crisistextline.org/ Text HOME to 741741 (USA & Canada) Kids Help Phone (Canada) https://kidshelpphone.ca/ Text CONNECT to 686868 (Canada) Call 1 800 668 6868 (Canada) National Suicide Prevention Lifeline (USA) http://www.suicidepreventionlifeline.org 1 800 273 TALK (8255) 1 800 SUICIDE (784 2433)

item.title: Flag a Story
item.description: Flagging a Story or a Critique If you encounter a story that is incorrectly rated according to our guidelines, or any material which does not comply with our content guidelines, please report it using the flag icon button at one the page in question. You will be presented with a choice of options. Please choose the most relevant option to the issue you are having with the material. You may add additional information in the report details textbox.

item.title: Copyright
item.description: Your Copyright: It Remains Yours. We’re working on making this more coherent. But in brief, you retain all copyright on all stories you upload. Since this is a private, users only service, your story is not considered published by submitting it to the Critique Wheel for the purpose of getting critique. You retain all original copyright on your work. See terms and conditions for more information on intellectual property rights.

item.title: Code of Conduct
item.description: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct Last Revised: May 1st, 2021 Our Pledge We as members, contributors, and leaders pledge to make participation in our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body size, visible or invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity and expression, level of experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, caste, color, religion, or sexual identity and orientation. We pledge to act and interact in ways that contribute to an open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, and healthy community.

item.title: Content
item.description: Content Guidelines Last Revised: August 31st, 2021 An Inclusive and Respectful Space At the Critique Wheel, we help writers improve their craft faster by exchanging critiques. In order to create and maintain an inclusive and respectful space, we want our critiquers to know the kind of material they will find on the Critique Wheel and and what kind of material is not accepted.
